student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Discussing exercise routines with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy swimming. What kind of sport do you enjoy?
I enjoy running. What about you? Do you enjoy any other activities?
Yes, I enjoy hiking too. Do you enjoy trying new exercises?
Yes, I enjoy trying yoga. Do you enjoy working out with friends?
Yes, I enjoy working out with friends. It’s more fun! Do you enjoy going to the gym?
I enjoy going to the gym. Do you enjoy exercising outdoors?
Yes, I enjoy exercising outdoors, especially in the park. It’s nice to be in nature! Do you enjoy doing any outdoor activities?
I enjoy cycling outdoors. Do you enjoy playing any team sports?
Yes, I enjoy playing basketball with friends. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
